name: Underwater Rescue
description:
The underwater expedition turns into a whole war in foreign waters, because the robot accidentally wandered in the wrong place and now they are trying to destroy it with rocket salvos, but it still continues its mission and rescues divers who need help.

UnderWater Rescue - A platformer with physical controls for a three-limbed robot that clings to ledges and makes its way through the underwater world, avoiding collisions with missiles and collecting divers on board.

Features of the game:
- Point Control
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
- Complexity
